definition: to oscillate without pause (idiom)/to fluctuate/(of thoughts) to wander/to waver
surname You
to swim/variant of 遊|游[you2]
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
(negative prefix)/not/no
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: He's still wavering between the 2 plans.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然在兩個計劃中游移不定。

to drift without a resting place (idiom)/roving/errant/vagrant/erratic

to hesitate
hesitancy/indecision/to waver
swiftly moving/fleet/to sway
to hesitate/indecisive
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
(idiom) to hesitate/to remain undecided
anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
elusive/hard to pin down/enigmatic
to hesitate to move forward/to hesitate/to hold back
to draw back/to move back and forth/to hesitate/in an instant
